com.rosettastone.succor.utils.format
Class FormatUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.rosettastone.succor.utils.format.FormatUtils

public final class FormatUtils
extends java.lang.Object

The FormatUtils allows to format data (address of customer): csvformatCustomerAddress, allows to create particular comment createComment.
